text: Daniel Lévi (26 August 1961 – 6 August 2022) was a French singer-songwriter, composer, and pianist. He was born in Constantine, French Algeria. His career began in 1983. He was known for his 2000 single "L'envie d'aimer". Lévi died of colon cancer in Bouches-du-Rhône, France at the age of 60.Le chanteur Daniel Lévi, qui luttait contre un cancer, est mort à 60 ans ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site *Forum about Daniel Lévi * * Category:1961 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French singer-songwriters Category:21st- century French composers Category:French pianists Category:20th-century French composers
title: Daniel Lévi
